biotools.summary: This R package  provides a classifier for predicting whether a given oligonucleotide sequence (of length l bp, where l would typically vary from six to as high as 25 bp) is, or is not, a transcription factor (TF) binding site.

bioschemas.name: regshape
bioschemas.summary: This R package  provides a classifier for predicting whether a given oligonucleotide sequence (of length l bp, where l would typically vary from six to as high as 25 bp) is, or is not, a transcription factor (TF) binding site.
